Class oracle.plsql.PInteger 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.plsql.PValue
           |
           +----oracle.plsql.PInteger
public class PInteger
extends PValue
This class encapsulates PL/SQL binary integers.

PInteger()
Constructs a NULL PL/SQL binary integer.
PInteger(int)
Constructs a PL/SQL binary integer with an initial value.

copy(PInteger)
Copies a PInteger.
intValue()
Returns the value of this PInteger as an int.
setValue(int)
Sets the value of this PInteger.
toString()
Returns the String representation of this PInteger.

PInteger 
  public PInteger()
Constructs a NULL PL/SQL binary integer.
PInteger 
  public PInteger(int value)
Constructs a PL/SQL binary integer with an initial value.
Parameters:
value - the initial value of the PInteger

intValue 
  public int intValue()
Returns the value of this PInteger as an int. You should use isNull() to determine if this value is NULL before getting the int value.
Throws: NullValueException
If the value is NULL.
See Also:
isNull
setValue 
  public void setValue(int value)
Sets the value of this PInteger. To set this PInteger to null, use setNull().
Parameters:
value - the int value to set
See Also:
setNull
copy 
  public void copy(PInteger value)
Copies a PInteger.
Parameters:
value - the PInteger to copy from
toString 
  public String toString()
Returns the String representation of this PInteger.
Overrides:
toString in class PValue
